content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array at position(1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position (1.0, 1.0) and another stone furnace at position (3.0, 0.0)
- Each furnace is currently working and has a fuel source of coal and is processing iron ore into iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnaces have enough space and resources to accept the items before attempting to insert.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to check the inventory of the furnaces to confirm that they contain the items you are trying to extract.

### Errors when using stale entity data
- Regularly refresh or check the status of entities on the map to avoid using outdated information that may lead to incorrect actions.
